featureHelp.fiscalDetails: View detailed breakdown of your fiscal year earnings, tax estimates, and savings goals.
featureHelp.budgetExpenses: Track your expenses and manage your budget allocation.
featureHelp.smartRosterScan: Automatically import your schedule by uploading a photo or PDF of your roster. We'll scan it and add shifts for you!
featureHelp.exportSync: Download your timesheet data as CSV or PDF reports, or sync your shifts directly to your calendar (ICS).
featureHelp.ytdGross: YTD (Year-To-Date) is the total accumulated salary from July 1 of the fiscal year to now. This is before tax deductions.
featureHelp.payg: PAYG (Pay As You Go) is a system where your employer deducts tax from your pay and sends it to the ATO. This amount is compared to your actual tax at year end.
featureHelp.taxLiability: This is the actual tax you need to pay based on Australian tax rates. Compared with the PAYG withheld above, this determines if you get a refund.

help.subtitle: Your Personal Roster & Pay Manager
help.intro: PayChecker makes it effortless to manage your work schedule, calculate accurate expected pay, and track your financial goalsâ€”all in one place.
help.autoRosterDesc:
• Snap & Upload: Just drag and drop your roster file (PDF or Image).
  • Automatic Schedule: The app reads your shiftsâ€”dates, times, and rolesâ€”and adds them to your calendar.
  • Smart Mapping: It remembers your job codes (e.g., "Shift A" â†’ "Bartender").
help.dashboardDesc:
• Track Your Earnings: See estimated earnings for the week or month instantly.
  • Set Goals: Set a Savings Goal and watch your progress bar grow as you complete shifts.
help.fiscalDesc:
• Tax Made Easy: View income based on the financial year.
  • Year-to-Date Tracking: Monitor your total cumulative income to stay on top of tax brackets.
help.expenseDesc:
• Log Deductions: Record work-related expenses like uniforms or courses.
  • Organized for Tax Time: Keep expenses categorized for easy tax filing.
help.multipleJobsDesc:
• Multiple Rates: Add different employers with specific base rates.
  • Penalty Rates: Define custom rules for weekends, public holidays, or overtime.
help.getStartedDesc:
• Add Your Jobs: Go to settings or use the "+" button to set up employers/rates.
  • Upload Roster: Use the Scanner tab (Sparkles icon) to upload your roster.
  • Check Dashboard: See your upcoming schedule and projected earnings!
